attrs.label: App Key
attrs.description:
The app key for Invoice Ninja.</br>
Must be exactly 32 characters long.</br>

attrs.label: App URL
attrs.description:
The base URL for Invoice Ninja.</br>
Examples:</br>
https://firefly.example.com </br>
http://192.168.1.100:30064

attrs.label: Initial User Email
attrs.description: The initial user email for Invoice Ninja.

attrs.label: Initial User Password
attrs.description: The initial user password for Invoice Ninja.

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.</br>
Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access

attrs.label: Host IPs
attrs.description: IPs on the host to bind this port

1.0.94.readme:
Invoice Ninja

Invoice Ninja is a source-available invoice, quote, project and time-tracking app built with Laravel
